articles.author: CHINEDU ASADU
articles.title: At least 140 villagers killed by suspected herders in weekend attacks in north-central Nigeria - The Associated Press
articles.description: Nigerian officials and survivors say at least 140 people were killed by gunmen who attacked remote villages in north-central Nigeria’s Plateau state in the latest of such mass killings this year blamed on the West African nation’s farmer-herder crisis. Platea…
articles.content: ABUJA, Nigeria (AP) At least 140 people were killed by gunmen who attacked remote villages over two days in north-central Nigerias Plateau state, survivors and officials said Tuesday in the latest of… [+2947 chars]

articles.author: Written by Anshul Gupta
articles.title: IND vs SA 1st Test Highlights: Rain calls off play on Day 1 as India finish at 208/8 after KL Rahul's fifty - India TV News
articles.description: India vs South Africa 1st Test, Day 1 Highlights: India ended the day on 208/8 with rain playing a massive part in Centurion on Boxing Day. Kagiso Rabada was the star of the day for South Africa with his maiden five-wicket haul against India with KL Rahul sta…
articles.content:
